channel.title: [PI] Shops buy back 10% downrate?
channel.description:
Hi guys,
I had the idea about having shops that you can (obviously) but items from for a certain price, but they will only buy it back for that price -10%. Anyway to do this? Haven't really found anything to do it that'd be great! Thank you.

item.title: [PI] Shops buy back 10% downrate?
item.dc:creator: @eyeownyew Eyeownyew
item.description:
@eyeownyew wrote:

[quote=“Slave Scyth, post:2, topic:410488”]int itemPrice;
int itemBuyPrice = itemPrice * .9;[/quote]
Fixed:

int itemBuyPrice; int itemSellPrice = Math.floor(itemBuyPrice * .9);

Read full topic

Ran it through eclipse and it worked…

Eclipse did the work for me
[/quote]

wtf is Math

item.title: [PI] Shops buy back 10% downrate?
item.dc:creator: @Muroth Muroth
item.description:
@Muroth wrote:

[quote=“UniqueTrys, post:5, topic:410488”][code=java]src\server\model\shops\ShopAssistant.java:302: error: possible loss of precision

int itemBuyPrice = itemPrice * 0.9;
^
required: int
found: double
Note: Some input files use unchecked or unsafe operations.
Note: Recompile with -Xlint:unchecked for details.
1 error
Press any key to continue . . .[/code]

Trying to add what you gave me to ShopAssistant.java doesn’t work…[/quote]
Not sure if this would work.

int itemBuyPrice = new double [itemPrice * 0.9];

Read full topic
